annotations.description: What a thrilling encounter, there was plenty of goal mouth action. The home team had more of the game. The home team made a lot of passes and attempted to maintain possession. The away side's tactic was what is known as kick and rush football.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Looks like Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) is struggling after picking up a knock. Hopefully he can run it off.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 3 min. of added time.

annotations.description: Jese (Real Madrid) decides to speed play up with a short corner kick.

Jese (Real Madrid) attempts to find his teammate with a final pass from outside of the box, but one of the defenders clears the ball to safety. The ball goes out of play. Real Madrid are awarded a corner kick.
Casemiro (Real Madrid) will miss the next game because of that yellow card.

annotations.description: Carlos Clos Gomez shows the yellow card to Casemiro (Real Madrid) for a heavy challenge.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Zinedine Zidane has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Jese (Real Madrid) replacing Lucas.

annotations.label: funfact

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The game has come to an end for Luka Modric. He has contributed as much as he could today. He will be replaced by the fresh legs of James Rodriguez (Real Madrid).
Eric Bertrand Bailly (Villarreal) is moving okay again after that injury scare.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: What a hit! Luka Modric (Real Madrid) shows good composure inside the box to fire a first time shot into the middle of the net. 3:0.
Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) fails to beat the offside trap and the linesman puts his flag up.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Isco (Real Madrid) works the corner short instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Eric Bertrand Bailly (Villarreal) picks up an injury.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) collects a pass inside the box and unleashes a shot which is brilliantly blocked by a defender. Real Madrid have a corner.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Marcelino Garcia Toral decides to make a substitution. Manuel Trigueros will be replaced by Rodrigo Hernandez (Villarreal).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Toni Kroos is replaced by Isco (Real Madrid).

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) whips in the corner, but one of the defending players gets a head on it and intercepts.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) sends a sweet pass into the penalty area, but one of the defenders averts the danger. The linesman points to the corner flag, Real Madrid are going to take it.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Karim Benzema displays great vision and sends a pass to Lucas (Real Madrid), who shows brilliant composure inside the box to bury the ball inside the right post. The score is 2:0.
Lucas (Real Madrid) attempted to create a dangerous situation in front of goal by sending a cross into the box, but the defence easily dealt with the threat.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Marcelino Garcia Toral has decided to substitute Adrian and he is replaced by Leo Baptistao (Villarreal).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The manager has decided to make a substitution and Jonathan dos Santos walks off the pitch to be replaced by Samuel (Villarreal).
Half chance! Lucas (Real Madrid) plays a pass into the box, but Sergio Asenjo reacts well to snuff out the attack.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance is 62678.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) makes a yard for himself and goes for goal from long range. It never troubles the goalkeeper as it flies well wide of the right post.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) sends a lofted cross into the box which is headed clear.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) gets on the end of a pass on the edge of the box but his shot is blocked.

Luka Modric (Real Madrid) knew what to do with the ball, but was just a bit unlucky. After receiving a pass, he sent the ball goalwards from some 18 metres out, but he missed the right post by a whisker.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) takes the corner with a short pass.
The ball is cleared after Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) attempted to dribble past an opposing player. The ball goes out for a corner. Real Madrid can continue in their attacking effort.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) jumps for a header from the corner kick, but fails to steer the ball into the goal as it flies high over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) prepares to take a corner kick.
Luka Modric (Real Madrid) blasts the ball from just outside the box, but his attempt is blocked by the defender. The referee signals a corner kick to Real Madrid.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) shows too much aggression during an attacking move and ends up fouling his opponent.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The second half gets underway.

The fans must be pleased so far with the entertainment on the pitch. Let's hope the players don't lose their passion and determination during the half time break. The home side is dominant and dictating the tempo of the game, mainly because of their work rate and accurate passing. The home side attempts to hold onto the ball for as long as possible, while the away team's main weapon is fast counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle to end the first half and the players are now heading to their respective dressing rooms.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: The referee gives a yellow card to Danilo (Real Madrid).

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: The foul by Manuel Trigueros (Villarreal) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Carlos Clos Gomez.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Denis Suarez (Villarreal) works the corner short.

Keylor Navas pulls off a great save to deny Cedric Bakambu (Villarreal), who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick shot towards the middle of the goal. Villarreal will take a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) sends in the corner, but fails to find the head of any of his teammates, allowing the defence to clear. The linesman makes the right call and Real Madrid will have a corner.

Decent spell from Real Madrid here and they keep the pressure on until one of the defending players steps in. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Real Madrid will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
